channel.title: My Recipes on Nhuyhoa Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in My Recipes on Nhuyhoa Recipes

item.title: 7 Layer Bar
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit butter butterscotch chips chocolate chips chopped nuts coconut flakes graham crackers sweetened condensed milk

item.title: Arroz Con Pollo
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit beer chicken carrot pepper cilantro rice garlic salt onion peas Instructions instructions Blend cilantro, onion, garlic, oil and beer to make marinade Marinate chicken with salt, pepper, and marinade Clean rice and mix in some salt, marinade, and beer Cook rice, stir it when done to distribute the greens Fry the chicken Eat rice with chicken and steamed peas and carrots

item.title: Banana Bread
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit baking powder eggs banana baking soda butter cinnamon flour pecans salt sugar vanilla yogurt

item.title: Banh Bao (Steamed Pork Buns)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit bot banh bao eggs dried fungus mushrooms oil ground pork shallot pepper lap xuong (chinese pork sausages) salt soy sauce sugar whole milk

item.title: Banh Canh (Vietnamese Thick Noodle Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit banh canh chicken bones bean sprouts fish sauce chicken feet chives msg chicken wings cilantro pepper dried shrimp daikon salt dried squid garlic sugar pork belly ginger wonton soup base pork bones green onions pork feet hanh kho pork hock onion shrimp shallot vietnamese mint

item.title: Banh Cuon (Vietnamese Steamed Rice Rolls)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam pha cha bean sprouts oil ground pork cucumber rice flour shrimp dried fungus mushrooms salt green onions shandong noodles hanh kho soy sauce lettuce tapioca starch mint wonton soup base shallot thai basil

item.title: Banh Day (Vietnamese Sticky Rice Cake)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit bot nep cha oil Instructions instructions Combine bot nep (glutinous rice flour) slowly with about 400 ml of water and about 1/3 cup of oil Mix dough; should be hard, not too soft Knead with hands Form little balls, a bit smaller than a stress ball Place on aluminum foil squares Steam for 20 min Sandwich cha between two rice cakes

item.title: Banh Flan Ca Phe
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit Cafe Du Monde coffee eggs Longevity sweetened condensed milk sugar whole milk Instructions instructions Put 4 spoons of coffee into a coffee press Pour boiling water into pressor and refill for a total of 3 times Let coffee cool for several hours Stir in milk, want a ratio 2 coffee : 1 milk Caramelize sugar with a little water until golden and coat over cake pan/walls Crack and beat 8 eggs at room temperature Stir in 2-3 spoons of sugar Stir in 1 can of longevity sweetened condensed milk Stir in coffee Pour into caramelized coated cake pan Steam for 20-25 min, want a light boil Turn off and let cake sit in steamer for 5 min Set out to cool and then refrigerate If more coffee desired, pour it onto cake after it has cooled

item.title: Banh Mi
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit banh mi cha carrot five spice powder pate cilantro maggi seasoning pork belly cucumber mayonnaise daikon pepper shallot salt sugar vinegar

item.title: Banh Xeo (Vietnamese Crepes)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit beer pork belly bean sprouts nuoc mam pha shrimp green onions oil lettuce pepper mint rice flour onion salt shallot tapioca starch turmeric

item.title: Bap Cai Luoc (Cabbage and Egg Sauce)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam eggs cabbage Instructions instructions Hard boil egg Cut up and boil cabbage Mash up egg and add nuoc mam & water Save the veggie broth and eat/drink as a canh

item.title: Bo Bia (Spring Rolls with Chinese Sausage)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit bun eggs cucumber hoisin sauce lap xuong (chinese pork sausages) lettuce peanut butter mint rice paper thai basil Instructions instructions Boil lap xuong for 15 min, move to ice bath when done Make thin egg omeletes, one egg at a time Slice sausages and eggs Prepare the bun Prepare the veggies To make sauce, dilute hoisin sauce & peanut butter with broth until the taste is right Make rolls

item.title: Bo Xao Dau Xanh (Beef and Green Bean Stir Fry)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit oyster sauce beef garlic pepper green beans salt mushrooms shallot Instructions instructions Marinate sliced beef with shallots, garlic, salt, pepper, and a pinch of oil Stir fry beef until cooked but moist (remove excess liquid) Stir in and cook mushrooms and green beans until soft Drizzle in diluted oyster sauce (1:1 ratio)

item.title: Bo Xao Khoai Tay Chien (Beef and French Fries Stir Fry)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit oyster sauce beef garlic pepper onion salt shallot Instructions instructions Marinate sliced beef with salt, pepper, minced shallots, garlic, and a pinch of oil Fry potatoes Stir fry beef until cooked but moist (remove excess liquid) Add potatoes and sliced onions Drizzle in diluted oyster sauce (1:1 ratio)

item.title: Bok Choy or Chinese Broccoli
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit oyster sauce bok choy soy sauce chinese broccoli sugar garlic wonton soup base Instructions instructions Blanche bok choy Mix 3 oyster sauce : 1 soy sauce : 2 sugar, and some wonton soup base or water Stir fry garlic until golden Stir fry bok choy for a couple minutes Add water and steam for a couple minutes Arrange on plate and drizzle with sauce

item.title: Broth
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit fish sauce chicken bones daikon msg chicken feet dried shitake mushrooms pepper chicken wings garlic salt dried shrimp ginger sugar dried squid green onions wonton soup base pork bones onion pork feet shallot pork hock

item.title: Bun Cha Gio (Vietnamese Egg Rolls and Noodles)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit bun ground chicken carrot mien ground pork cucumber nuoc mam pha shrimp dried fungus mushrooms lettuce mint perilla shallot

item.title: Bun Mang Vit (Vietnamese Duck Noodle Soup with Bamboo Shoot)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit bun duck bamboo shoots chicken broth cilantro pepper ginger salt green onions wonton soup base shallot Instructions instructions Defrost and clean duck with salt and water Cut off the duck head, cut open stomach and take out internal organs Slice duck by thighs to make it easier to cook Marinate duck with salt, pepper, and minced shallots Add duck and parts to boiling water, use just enough water to just cover the duck Peel and smash ginger, add to pot Boil duck on medium or low heat with the cover on, want a light boil for a total of 1 hour Periodically skim off foam and remove clumps Can check on status by stabbing chicken in breast/thigh with chopstick and ensuring there are no red streaks Take out duck and cut up the meaty parts, put bony parts back into broth Maintain a slow boil of broth, add chicken broth to desired level and add wonton soup base Adjust broth to taste, should taste salty Slice bamboo shoots into strips and clean Blanche bamboo strips Add bamboo into broth Cut up duck and refrigerate Serve bun with duck, green onions, cilantro, broth, and nuoc mam pha with ginger

item.title: Bun Rieu (Vietnamese Crab Noodle Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit bun eggs bean sprouts chicken broth ground pork cilantro crab paste shrimp green onions mam tom tofu lettuce salt tofu puffs mint wonton soup base shallot tomato yellow onion

item.title: Bun Thit Nuong (Vietnamese Grilled Pork and Noodles)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit bun pork shoulder butt cucumber honey garlic nuoc mam green onions nuoc mam pha lettuce pepper mint sugar perilla

item.title: Ca Chien (Fried Fish)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam pha catfish garlic pepper shallot salt Instructions instructions Cut catfish approximately 3 in long Marinate fish in salt, pepper, minced shallots and garlic Place in fridge for a half hour Fry both sides of fish on medium heat Eat with nuoc mam pha

item.title: Ca Kho (Braised and Carmelized Catfish)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam catfish onion pepper shallot salt Instructions instructions Marinate catfish chunks with salt, pepper, and shallots Warm up pot with oil enough to cover the bottom of the pot Add a few spoons of sugar and heat on medium heat, stirring until fully liquid and light brown Take off heat and stir in minced shallots Put pot back on burner and stir for few more minutes until shallots golden Pour in some nuoc mam Layer the pan bottom with yellow onion strips and sprinkle in pepper Layer fish on top of onions Add water up to top level of fish Cook on medium for 30 min Add nuoc mam for flavor Cook on low heat for 30 min until reduce 50% of liquid

item.title: Ca Mackerel
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam pha mackerel fish lemongrass pepper onion salt shallot Instructions instructions Cut fish from butt to head, remove fins, tail, gills, gut, head, etc Wash fish by rubbing softly with vinegar and salt Marinate with conservative amounts of salt and pepper If wanted, stuff with lemongrass and onions Steaming: steam fish for 20-25 min Grilling: broil on high heat, skin down, for 15-20 min Frying: pan fry on medium heat with shallots, skin down & flip midway until internal temperature sufficient Eat with nuoc mam pha

item.title: Ca Mackerel in Miso Sauce
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit miso mackerel fish ginger sake soy sauce sugar Instructions instructions Cut 1 mackerel into 4 piece filets and cut cross incision on the skin Bring to a boil 1 c water, 0.

item.title: Ca Teriyaki (Teriyaki Fish)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit pepper catfish salt salmon fish teriyaki sauce Instructions instructions Marinate fish in salt, pepper, minced shallots and garlic Fry both sides of fish on medium heat Pour in teriyaki sauce and cook until thick, spooning onto fish

item.title: Canh Ca Chua Dau Hu (Tofu and Tomato Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam fish tofu cilantro wonton soup base pork rib tips green onions tofu onion tofu puffs shallot tomato Instructions instructions Heat yellow onion, shallots, and tomatoes in pot on medium heat When tomatoes have softened, add 1 bowl of water Add tofu (fried if desired), soy puffs, pork chops, or fish tofu Add wonton soup base and nuoc mam, adjust to taste Simmer for 15 minutes Add cilantro, green onions, etc in last few minutes

item.title: Canh Cai Cuc (Chrysanthemum Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit chicken broth ground pork chrysanthemum wonton soup base shallot Instructions instructions Golden minced shallots Stir fry ground pork until no longer pink Add an equal amount of water and chicken broth Season with wonton soup base Adjust broth to taste, want it light Cut chrysanthemums (cai cuc, tung ho) into 3 in lengths, use the stems if they are tender enough Add steams first then leaves Bring to a small simmer and then remove from heat

item.title: Canh Cha Ca (Fish Cake Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam cha ca (fish paste) dill wonton soup base green onions onion shallot tomato Instructions instructions Heat yellow onion, shallots, and tomatoes in pot on medium heat When tomatoes have softened, add 1 bowl of water Add cha ca Add wonton soup base and nuoc mam, adjust to taste Simmer for 15 minutes Add dill and green onions in the last few minutes

item.title: Canh Chua Ca (Sweet and Sour Fish Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam catfish bean sprouts pineapple pepper elephant ear stem salt garlic sugar green onions tamarind okra rice paddy herbs tomato

item.title: Canh Dua Chua (Pickled Mustard Green Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit chicken broth beef rough flank dua chua nuoc mam pha pork belly shallot wonton soup base tomato Instructions instructions Stir minced shallots until golden in a pot on medium heat Put in thinly sliced meat (leave beef flanks in large strips) and stir for about 5 min, want it mostly cooked Add in a little bit of water and simmer for 5-10 min on low Mix in sliced tomatoes and dua cha Stir well for a few minutes Put in 2:1 ratio of chicken broth and water, may also add dua chua liquid of desired Add wonton soup base When soup starts to boil, turn to low, cover with lid and let it sit for 20 min Add nuoc mam pha Adjust to taste, want it sweet and sour

item.title: Canh Khoai Mo (Ube Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit chicken broth shrimp rice paddy herbs pepper shallot salt ube wonton soup base Instructions instructions Process peeled shrimp, salt, pepper, and shallots Golden minced shallots Add shrimp mixture Add chicken broth and wonton soup base Bring to a boil, then lower heat Add mashed ube (khoai mo bao) and simmer Add rice paddy herbs (ngo om) in the last few minutes

item.title: Canh Khoai Tay Suon (Taro and Pork Rib Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit chicken broth pork rib tips rice paddy herbs pepper shallot salt taro wonton soup base yam Instructions instructions Marinate the pork in salt, pepper, shallots Blanche meat, then dump liquid and thoroughly rinse to remove impurities Boil pork rib tips with extra marinade on medium heat When foam starts to form, lower heat and remove foam When foam all clear, turn to medium high heat and cover loosely with lid Add chicken broth and wonton soup base Boil taro or yam in a separate pot Add taro or yam to soup Add rice paddy herbs (ngo om) in the last few minutes

item.title: Canh Muop Mong Toi (Spinach and Luffa Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit pepper dried shrimp malabar spinach salt shallot wonton soup base taiwanese okra Instructions instructions Soak fried shrimp in hot water and mash fried shrimp Stir fry taiwanese okra (luffa) & shallots with salt & pepper Add bowl of fried shrimp & additional water Add wonton soup base Add malabar spinach prior to boiling Adjust to taste as necessary Canh spoils easily, so refridgerate when cool

item.title: Cha (Vietnamese Ham)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit baking powder pork shoulder garlic fish sauce shallot msg sugar tapioca starch Instructions instructions Process 1 lb pork shoulder (partially frozen), shallots and garlic Add a mixture of 1 tbsp sugar, 2 tbsp tapioca starch, 0.

item.title: Cha Ca (Fish Cake)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam shrimp dill nuoc mam pha tilapia fish garlic pepper shallot salt sugar tapioca starch

item.title: Chao (Porridge)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit gio chao quay chicken green onions jasmine rice ground pork shallot pepper salt wonton soup base Instructions instructions Make rice Marinate chicken or pork with salt, pepper & shallots If using pork, stir fry it Boil water and add chicken/pork If using chicken, remove after boiling and shred into strips when cooled Add rice and boil until it has expanded (~1 hr) Add wonton soup base Spoon into bowl and adjust with pepper, gio chao quay, minced green onions

item.title: Che Thai (Vietnamese Fruit Cocktail)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit amyl acetate flavoring essence jackfruit half & half longan nata de coco Instructions instructions Cut the jackfruit into strips Combine longan, jackfruit, and nata de coco in a big container Add all of syrup from fruit cans (all of longan and some of jackfruit as needed) and 2 cups of half & half Add 1 drop of amyl acetate flavoring essence Mix well and serve with crushed ice

item.title: Com Chien (Fried Rice)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit chicken powder eggs garlic any pepper any onion rice shallot salt any soy sauce Instructions instructions Make rice with less rice or use day-old rice that is dry Prepare and cook the meat and veggies, drying thoroughly Golden shallots, garlic, onions Add eggs on low power Add salt, pepper, soy sauce Scramble eggs and add moderate amount of rice Stir fry rice and add seasonings (salt, pepper, soy sauce, chicken powder) to liking Once rice is done (fried and toasty), stir in meat and veggies

item.title: Dau Hu Teriyaki (Teriyaki Tofu)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit teriyaki sauce tofu Instructions instructions Fry tofu Set tofu aside and allow oil to drain Simmer teriyaki sauce on medium heat until the sauce becomes thick Add tofu and coat with sauce

item.title: Dau Sot Ca Chua (Fried Tofu with Tomato Sauce)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam tofu green onions onion tomato Instructions instructions Fry tofu Heat yellow onion and tomatoes in pot on medium heat When tomatoes have softened, add very small bowl of water Add fried tofu Add with nuoc mam and water for flavor Simmer for 15 minutes Add green onions in last few minutes

item.title: Dau Xao Hanh (Stir Fried Tofu and Green Onions)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam tofu green onions shallot Instructions instructions Cut shallots and green onions Make a 1:1 mixture of water and nuoc mam in a small bowl Fry tofu Stir fry the shallots until golden Add green onions and stir until they soften Add tofu and sauce mixture Stir and adjust to taste, remove from heat after a few minutes

item.title: Dua Chua (Pickled Mustard Greens)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit brown sugar green onions salt mustard greens Instructions instructions Cut mustard greens Using the white parts of the green onions, cut into quarter circles Mix 1.75 tbsp brown sugar, 1 tbsp salt, and 1L of warm water Before adding the salt and water, squeeze the brown sugar and green onions Taste mixture, should be sweet and sour Add mustard green leaves Squeeze the mixture Pour mixture into a container and tightly seal Store in a warm place for a few days Try a piece, want it to be sweet and sour Place in fridge when it has the desired taste

item.title: Dumplings
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit pepper ground pork green onions salt shrimp shallot soy sauce water chestnuts sugar vinegar wonton wrappers

item.title: Eggs Omelette
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit mien eggs dried fungus mushrooms nuoc mam pha ground pork onion pepper shallot salt soy sauce Instructions instructions Soak mien and a few fungus separately in boiling water for a couple minutes, drain, rinse and repeat Combine eggs and mixed fillings Stir fry shallots until golden Add egg mixture Cook both sides until golden Serve with nuoc mam pha

item.title: Fruit
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit asian pear cantaloupe durian jackfruit longan mango persimmon pineapple plum watermelon

item.title: Fruit Tart
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit butter any cinnamon cornstarch eggs flour graham crackers salt sugar vanilla whole milk

item.title: Ga Bourbon (Bourbon Chicken)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit bourbon chicken thigh onion brown sugar shallot corn starch five spice powder hoisin soy sauce sugar

item.title: Ga Ca Ri (Vietnamese Chicken Curry)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit baguette chicken carrot chicken broth potato chicken powder shallot curry powder sweet potato pepper yam salt wonton soup base

item.title: Ga Chicken Tikka Masala
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit coriander powder chicken cilantro garam masala garlic mustard powder ginger naan bread onion paprika tomato salt sugar turmeric yogurt

item.title: Ga Chien Nuoc Mam (Fried Chicken Fish Sauce)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam chicken garlic pepper sesame oil sugar Instructions instructions Marinate chicken with minced garlic, black pepper, and a pinch of sesame oil Fry chicken Boil mixture with ratio 1.

item.title: Ga Chien Xi Dau (Fried Chicken Soy Sauce)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit pepper chicken shallot salt soy sauce Instructions instructions Marinate chicken with salt, pepper, shallots, and soy sauce Fry chicken on medium low heat

item.title: Ga Luoc Cham Nuoc Mam Gung (Boiled Chicken with Ginger Fish Sauce)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam pha chicken ginger Instructions instructions Boil deboned chicken thighs under a light boil until internal temperature hits 165F Refrigerate chicken Eat with nuoc mam cha mixed with ginger

item.title: Ga Teriyaki (Teriyaki Chicken)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit pepper chicken thigh salt teriyaki sauce Instructions instructions Debone skin-on chicken thighs and prick both sides of chicken with fork Salt chicken and let sit for a while to drain water Marinate chicken with salt and pepper On medium high heat, cook chicken skin-side down (no oil) until crispy then flip and cook until fully cooked Add teriyaki sauce and simmer on medium heat until the sauce becomes thick Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces and pour extra sauce on top

item.title: Garlic Mashed Potatoes (with Gravy and Hot Honey Sauce)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit apple cider vinegar garlic bourbon potato butter shallot chicken broth cumin flour honey milk mustard powder paprika pepper salt sugar tomato powder

item.title: Goi (Salad)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit apple cider vinegar lettuce pepper onion salt tomato sugar Instructions instructions In a small bowl, mix sugar, apple cider vinegar, sliced yellow onion, and pinch of black pepper Slice tomatoes and sprinkle with salt and sugar Cut lettuce to bite-sided pieces Mix tomatoes, lettuce and sauce Serve with rice and a meat dish

item.title: Goi Cuon (Spring Rolls)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit bun pork belly cucumber hoisin sauce shrimp lettuce peanut butter mint rice paper thai basil salt Instructions instructions Boil pork belly for a few minutes and then dump liquid Boil pork belly with salt on medium high heat for ~30 min Boil shell-on shrimp on medium heat until pink, then remove shell Slice pork belly and shrimp Prepare the bun Prepare the veggies To make sauce, dilute hoisin sauce & peanut butter with broth until the taste is right Make rolls

item.title: Goi Ga (Vietnamese Chicken Salad)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam pha chicken cabbage pepper any hanh kho salt onion sugar thai basil vinegar vietnamese mint Instructions instructions Chop veggies into thin strips Add boiled chicken torn into strips Add chopped Vietnamese mint/coriander (rau ram) and thai basil Season with salt, pepper and a vinegar/sugar sauce, want sweet and sour Eat goi with hanh kho and nuoc mam pha

item.title: Goi My (Salad American Style)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit banana chips cabbage avocado pepper cilantro cranberry pita chips corn lime salt cucumber mandarin orange sugar edamame strawberry mint watermelon spinach any tomato

item.title: Goi Salsa (Salsa)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit banana chips cabbage avocado pepper cilantro lime pita chips corn mandarin orange salt cucumber mango sugar edamame mint red onion tomato

item.title: Granola
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit almonds banana chips brown sugar flax seeds honey old fashioned rolled oats pita chips rice crispies cereal salt vanilla veggie oil

item.title: Green Bean Casserole
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit chicken broth garlic cream green beans flour hanh kho lemon juice mushrooms pepper onion salt soy sauce

item.title: Ground Meat
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit chicken thigh pork shoulder butt Instructions instructions Cut meat up into chunks Partially freeze meat for 15 min Blend up meat in the food processor

item.title: Hanh Kho
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit onion shallot Instructions instructions Slice shallots or onions into slices Let it sit for a couple hours in the sun to dry Heat some oil on low Mix the slices with some flour Add the slices to the oil Remove slices when it has a light golden color Let the fried slices dry for a few hours in the sun

item.title: Mam Tom Chung (Shrimp Paste Ground Meat)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit black pepper ground chicken cucumber mam tom ground pork lemongrass sugar shallot Instructions instructions Golden minced shallots and lemongrass Stir in ground meat, breaking up into small chunks Stir on medium heat until no longer pink Drain meat juices Add in ratio of 1 sugar : 0.

item.title: Mi Hoanh Thanh (Wonton Noodle Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit chicken broth ground pork bok choy mi pork xa xiu chives oyster sauce shrimp cilantro pepper green onions salt hanh kho sesame oil mustard greens soy sauce shallot sugar water chestnuts wonton soup base wonton wrappers

item.title: Mi Vit Quay (Roast Duck Noodle Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit chicken broth roast duck chives mi hanh kho wonton soup base lettuce mustard greens Instructions instructions Buy a whole roast duck at a Chinese barbecue restaurant Cut up the roast duck, save the bony parts for the broth and refrigerate the rest Fill large pot 1/4 full with water, add bony duck parts, and sauce (comes with duck) When the broth starts to boil, fill 3/4 pot with chicken broth and add wonton soup base Want the broth to maintain a light boil Wash and cut veggies Boil the lettuce and mustard greens Stir fry washed/dried mi until it is a little crunchy, sprinkle with some soy sauce and chives Eat with mi, veggies, roast duck, broth, and hanh kho

item.title: Miso Soup
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit dashi tofu green onions miso any seaweed paper any Instructions instructions Boil 4 cups water & 2 tsp of dashi granules Hydrate seaweed paper in warm water Reduce heat to medium and add meats/veggies & seaweed Remove from heat and mix in 3 tbsp of blended miso Garnish with green onions

item.title: Mochi
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit cornstarch glutinous rice flour ice cream sugar Instructions instructions Scoop ice cream into balls and place in muffin cups and freeze until it hardens Mix a ratio of 2 glutinous rice flour : 3 sugar : 3 water Add jam flavorings if desired Cover and microwave for 2 minutes Mix and microwave for another 40 seconds Mix until glossy Add mochi to a tray covered with corn starch Sprinkle corn starch on top, lightly pat and spread mochi out on tray Refrigerate for 30-60 min Cut into mochi square pieces and remove excess starch Layer mochi pieces between saran wrap Refrigerate for another 30-60 min Place ice cream scoop onto mochi and fold up the sides and seal Use saran wrap to maintain seal Freeze until the mochi firms up If there are extra mochi pieces, cut them up into small pieces and freeze to make mini mochis

item.title: Muc Xao (Squid Stir Fry)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit oyster sauce squid chinese celery pineapple pepper garlic salt shallot Instructions instructions Clean squid well, cut patterns into patterned chunks or circles Marinate squid with black pepper and a little salt Cut chinese celery into inch long segments and cut pineapple into thin chunks Golden minced shallots and garlic Add squid, discarding any water that comes out from the squid Stir in pineapple and chinese celery Add diluted oyster sauce, when squid is done (changes from translucent color to white) Adjust to taste

item.title: Nui (Macaroni Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit macaroni noodles pork rib tips mustard greens pepper shallot salt wonton soup base Instructions instructions Make pork broth with pork rib tips Boil mustard greens in pork broth Make macaroni noodles separately Eat noodles with pork, greens, and broth

item.title: Nuoc Mam Pha
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam garlic sugar vinegar Instructions instructions Add sugar to a large bowl and level out Pour vinegar into the bowl, slightly over the surface of the sugar Add nuoc mam, about 1/3 of current level Mix in water to dilute Adjust to taste, should be sweet and sour, not salty Mix in minced garlic

item.title: Pad Thai
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit brown sugar eggs bean sprouts bun any chives nuoc mam garlic peanuts shallot tamarind any Instructions instructions Soak the bun in room temperature water for 1 hour until it is pliable yet firm Make sauce: ratio of 4 tamarind concentrate : 3 brown sugar : 2 nuoc mam : 3 water Heat sauce in microwave so everything is dissolved Cook the meats, remove and set aside Golden minced shallots and garlic Mix bun in sauce in a dry bowl and then add to pan Add additional water and oil as needed to cook bun Make some room in the pan, add eggs Scramble the eggs and mix in with the bun Stir in meats and veggies

item.title: Poke Bowl
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit eel sauce crab green onions sesame oil eel hanh kho soy sauce salmon fish onion shrimp Instructions instructions Marinate cubed salmon in mix of 1 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tsp sesame oil, sliced onion and green onion Add other ingredients if desired (Goi Salsa) Eat with rice

item.title: Rau Muong Xao Toi (Stir Fried Water Spinach)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit mam tom garlic shallot water spinach Instructions instructions Blanche water spinach (rau muong, ong choy) Golden minced shallots and garlic Add in water spinach Stir in diluted mam tom Stir fry for few minutes

item.title: Royal Tea
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit creamer honey Tea zone golden milk tea Instructions instructions Make tea, combine ingredients and adjust to taste

item.title: Smoothie
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit apple juice spinach banana orange juice blueberries soy milk dates vanilla honey yogurt mandarin orange mango peach pineapple strawberry

item.title: Spaghetti
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit Rinaldi sauce ground beef mushrooms spaghetti onion shallot spinach Instructions instructions Prepare the noodles Cook shallots in pot with oil Cook ground beef and drain meat fat Add Rinaldi pasta sauce Simmer Add nuoc mam for taste Add mushrooms and onions Simmer

item.title: Steak
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit butter beef ribeye steak garlic garlic powder shallot msg pepper salt Instructions instructions Rub seasonings on 1.

item.title: Sushi
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit eel sauce crab carrot avocado japanese mayo eel cucumber rice eggs hanh kho rolling mat pork belly seaweed paper shrimp spinach Instructions instructions Press 3/4 of the seaweed paper with rice with flip over with empty rice side near body Place ingredients in a row and tightly roll using rolling mat To prepare eel, buy barbecued eel from Asian store and bake at 350F for 15 minutes Fry both sides of sliced pork belly until not pink, then add sauce with ratio 1 sugar : 1 mirin : 2 soy sauce and some garlic Filling suggestions: carrots, spinach, thin egg omelette, crab any combo of crab, shrimp tempura, eel with cucumbers, avocado, hanh kho, eel sauce and japanese mayo

item.title: Teriyaki Sauce
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit mirin garlic sake ginger soy sauce onion sugar shallot Instructions instructions Mix teriyaki sauce: ratio 2 soy sauce : 2 sake : 2 mirin : 1 sugar Bring mixture to a boil and continuously stir on medium low Simmer for 10-15 min or until sauce is thickened When small bubbles start to rise/appear when mixing, pour sauce in glass jar, cool, and refridgerate for 2-3 weeks

item.title: Thit Heo Luoc Cham Tom Mam (Pork Belly with Fermented Shrimp Paste)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit mam tom pork belly pepper salt Instructions instructions Marinate pork belly with salt and pepper Blanche meat, then dump liquid and thoroughly rinse to remove impurities Boil pork belly with more marinade on medium high heat ~60 min, then move to ice bath Slice pork belly Serve with tom mam sauce

item.title: Thit Heo Quay (Roast Pork Belly)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit baking soda pork belly coarse salt five spice powder salt shaoxing wine sugar vinegar

item.title: Thit Kho (Braised and Carmelized Pork Belly with Eggs)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam eggs shallot pepper pork belly salt Instructions instructions Marinate pork belly cubes with salt, pepper, and shallots Warm up pot with oil enough to cover the bottom of the pot Add a few spoons of sugar and heat on medium heat, stirring until fully liquid and light brown Take off heat and stir in minced shallots Put pot back on burner and stir for few more minutes until shallots golden Pour in some nuoc mam Stir fry in pork belly Add water up to top level of pork Cook on medium for 2 hours, removing meat foam Hard boil eggs and add that to pot Add nuoc mam for flavor Cook on low heat for 30 min until reduce 50% of liquid

item.title: Thit Ram or Suon (Carmelized Pork Spare Ribs or Belly)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit cornstarch pork belly green onions pepper pork rib tips onion salt shallot soy sauce sugar vinegar

item.title: Thit Tom Rang (Pork and Shrimp Stir Fry)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam pork belly garlic pepper shrimp green onions salt onion sugar shallot Instructions instructions Want a ratio of 2 shrimp : 1 pork belly sliced Season both lightly with salt, pepper, and shallots Golden minced shallots and garlic Stir fry pork until no longer pink Stir in shrimp Add a ratio of 1 sugar : 1 nuoc mam, with some water Simmer for 10 min Add in sliced yellow onion and minced green onions Cover and wait a few minutes to fully cook

item.title: Thit Xa Xiu (Char Siu Pork)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit fermented bean curd in dressing with red yeast rice pork shoulder butt garlic five spice powder garlic powder hoisin sauce honey msg oyster sauce paprika pepper sesame oil shaoxing wine soy sauce sugar

item.title: Tom Rang Me (Shrimp in Tamarind Sauce)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit cornstarch shrimp cabbage nuoc mam ginger pepper green onions salt onion sugar shallot tamarind Instructions instructions Make sauce using ratio of 2 sugar : 2 tamarind concentrate : 1 nuoc mam; should taste sweet and sour Marinate shrimp with salt, pepper, shallots and cornstarch Prepare the veggies Golden minced shallots and garlic Add sauce and simmer until thick Add shrimp and stir until mostly cooked Stir in cabbage Turn off heat and add yellow and green onion Cover for few minutes

item.title: Xoi Che Hoa Cau
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit flavoring extract peeled mung bean salt sugar tapioca starch xoi vo Instructions instructions Rinse, soak, steam a few spoons of mung bean (as with xoi vo) Dissolve 0.

item.title: Xoi Man
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit salt chicken garlic sweet rice lap xuong (chinese pork sausages) green onions yuk (pork floss) hanh kho shallot Instructions instructions Wash sweet rice and drain Add hot water, just enough to cover rice, and cook in rice cooker Mix sweet rice when it is rice Stir fry chicken and shred into pieces Boil lap xuong for 15 min and cut into slices Stir fry minced shallots and garlic until slightly golden Add minced green onions a few minutes before taking off heat Plate sweet rice, layer with yuk, chicken, lap xuong, stir fried veggies, and hanh kho

item.title: Xoi Vo
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit peeled mung bean cha hanh kho salt sweet rice Instructions instructions Want a ratio of 2 sweet rice : 1 peeled mung bean Rinse and soak each separately in cold water overnight Rinse and and drain separately Let the rice sit and dry while you work on the mung beans Steam mung bean for 15-20 min, it should hold its shape but can be smashed between fingers Granulate mung been until powdery Mix rice with mung bean, 1 tbsp salt, and 1 tsp oil Steam for 60 min Take it out and let it cool, want it to be dry and well separated Eat with cha, hanh kho or che hoa cau
